entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Longshot - Screenshot & OCR
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro version lifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫599,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫449,99

Application Description

## Annotation and Color Picking Conveniently annotate the screen, a great helper for communicating with colleagues, simple and easy to use. - Drawing tools, shapes, ovals, lines, arrows, text, marker pen, freehand drawing. - Annotation and measurement, mosaic, blur, annotation notes, measure pixel distances, color picking, rich functions. - Step annotation, clear expression of ideas, customizable number content - Convenient operations, shortcuts, undo, save, open, copy to clipboard, easy and simple. ## Scrolling Capture Optimized image stitching algorithm makes scrolling capture adaptable to various environments, easily capture conversation context scrolling up and down. - Vertical/horizontal/360 degrees, support vertical, horizontal, panoramic scrolling capture, scroll any direction to capture. - Non-solid color background/non-scrolling areas, capture area can include non-scrolling objects with non-solid color background, good scrolling capture screenshot stitching. - Dynamically adjust scrolling direction/area, can change scrolling direction and readjust capture area after completion for restitching during scrolling. - Entire window scrolling capture, hold Option to capture entire scrolling window screenshot, automatic edge area handling. ## OCR Text Recognition Offline OCR algorithm with emphasis on privacy protection. Quickly extract text from images, videos, documents or anywhere. - Select screen area, recognize text, copy to clipboard, paste to notes, editors, messages etc. - Support QR and barcode recognition, quickly open corresponding links. - Support text-to-speech playback of recognized text. ## Screen Element Measurement Quickly measure any content on screen, automatically recognize distances and element sizes. - Measure distance, automatically recognize distance between elements or objects on screen, annotate distance. - Measure element, just select approximate element area, can automatically snap to element and annotate size. - Support distance and element edge color tolerance adjustment for more precise localization. ## Image Pinning Turn images, text from anywhere into desktop pins for convenient comparison. - Clipboard pinning, pin images, text, HTML etc. from clipboard to desktop. - Double-click pinned image, double-click pinned image or open pinned image on desktop to view. - Pinned image scrolling, scroll pinned image, double-click to close or minimize, support flipping and mirroring etc image operations. ## Screen Recording Quickly record steps, one click to record full screen, selected area or window for easy sharing. - Support full-screen, region and window recording, application recording. - Support system sound, microphone recording, frame rate settings etc. ## Window Capture Select window to highlight subject, make capture area better convey intent. - Intelligent window recognition, automatically highlight window mouse is in. - Multiple window combinations, hold Shift to select multiple windows for combined capture. ## Contact Full introduction: https://longshot.chitaner.com Email: office.chitaner@gmail.com QQ group: 780402788 ## Purchase Lifetime license of Longshot Pro allows unlimited screenshot scrolling, step annotation, element measurement and sizing annotation, OCR text recognition, custom hotkeys - unlock all current pro features. ------------------------------------------------------- Privacy Policy: https://longshot.chitaner.com/privacy/ Terms of Use: https://longshot.chitaner.com/terms/

Application Screenshot

iPhone
